description: Adults and children all around Charleston are invited to come to this truck to choose their favorite flavor and then choose the perfect chewies in order to create a refreshing and heavenly Hoba Boba creation. There’s Taro, Coffee, Honey Green Tea, Brown Sugar, and Honeydew too (and these are only a few!) and then for the chewies, you’ve got original tapioca pearls, and a fruity selection of jellies and popping pearls as well. Once you’re confident in your concoction, you can walk away slurping from your cup of delectable perfection. Head to Hoba Boba soon for a most happy and bubbly beverage experience.
name: Hoba Boba
